title: [Large-Scale] Blended Collaborative Learning Program Design for Healthcare Professionals in Low- and Middle-Income Regions

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Field Knowledge and Teamwork Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment considering limited internet access. Performing task-based assignments reflecting real-world work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three major collaboration scenarios occurring in low-income healthcare settings
Learners can practically apply two strategies for effective team communication in environments with limited digital resources
Learners can complete a multidisciplinary collaborative problem-solving process through a maternal and child health (MCH) project designed in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
